column4: anyone have problems installing tetex-doc and/or tetex-extra?  synaptic can't find them
i stand corrected on the mepis thing.  they have free versions.  last time i was there i just noticed the pay ones.
go into your synaptic preferences and check the other repositories, then youw ill see it
- they are all checked except for the cdrom one.  i dont have the cd with me
